message: Ruby on Rails RoR screen-casts and interactive leaning without setup the environment and guess what it's FREE! http://railsforzombies.org/
name: Code School - RailsForZombies
caption: www.railsforzombies.org
description: Then you may want to check out Rails Best Practices, which is full of techniques to clean up your code and improve the quality of your Rails applications. It also covers a bunch of Rails 3 methods you may not have seen before.

data.message: Sweeeeet. I'm signing up. Who wants to join and study together. I'm already going through Beginning Rails 3 and I like it.
